about_the_game:
Description

We control a taxi driver through New York City's Street in October 1938. We are Paul River who will live an adventure which change our minds. We will meet historical characters, visit main and real New York places such as 57th West Street in old stetic graphics as tribute form to the first 3D-Games. "The world doesn't Know, but we are in danger."

Story


It's a normal day in Paul's taxi picking up every client that he is possible to assist. Luckily, a beautiful woman appears in the night. She is a little anxious and she wants to go to CBS. "It's to late to visit the radio station but there is no problem." He said. "I'll be a gentleman." She ask him if he could wait her for a while beause she needs to take something from the radio station. "I gess she works nights." Finally, she appears undisturbed but when she is in the car, something starts following them. But we are alone!

Features

Action, speed and stealth in a story of 1938.
Classic graphics based on first 3D-Game which were born in PC and PSX.
Mysterious soundtrack created for intense and disconcerting story.
Walk or drive knowing th truth of this amazing adventure.
Historic characters and real places such as New York.

content_descriptors.notes: This game can content blood, insults, turture, experiments, drugs and mistreatment and genocide.

name: Invisible X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

We visit New York places such as 57th West Street with old stetic graphics as tribute for PS1 3d-Games. "The world doesn't know it but we are in danger."
